assessments.name: EU AI Act (Regulation EU) 2024/1689
assessments.description: Obligations of the EU AI Act supported by relevant industry standards

tasks.name: Risk Management System
tasks.description: Establish, Implement, Document and Maintain the risk management system

tasks.name: Risk Indentification and Analysis
tasks.description: Identify and Analyze known and foreseeable risks in case of appropriate use

tasks.name: Risk Estimation and Evaluation
tasks.description: Estimate and Evaluate risks in case of appropriate use and foreseeable misuse

tasks.name: Post-Market Risk Evaluation
tasks.description: Evaluate risks based on post-market monitoring data

tasks.name: Impact on Vulnerable Groups
tasks.description: Consider adverse impact on vulnerable groups (esp. minors)

tasks.name: Risk Exclusions
tasks.description: Exclude risks which cannot reasonably be addressed by measures in Art. 9(5)

tasks.name: Risk Appriopriateness and Targetedness
tasks.description: Appropriateness and targetedness for identified risks

tasks.name: Risk Interaction
tasks.description: Consideration of interaction with other requirements

tasks.name: Risk Elimination or Reduction
tasks.description: Where possible, eliminate or reduce risks through design or development

tasks.name: Risk Mitigation
tasks.description: Where appropriate, implement mitigation and control measures

tasks.name: Provision of Information and Training
tasks.description: Provide information pursuant to Art. 13 and training to deploy

tasks.name: Testing for Risk Management
tasks.description: Testing to identify targeted risk management measures, ensure consistent performance, and compliance

tasks.name: Lifecycle Testing
tasks.description: Testing throughout development and carry out against defined metrics and appropriate thresholds

tasks.name: Design Choices
tasks.description: Consider relevant design choices

tasks.name: Data Collection
tasks.description: Consider data collection processes, data origin, and the original purpose of personal data collection

tasks.name: Data Preperation
tasks.description: Consider relevant data-preparation processing operations

tasks.name: Data Assumptions
tasks.description: Formulate assumptions.

tasks.name: Availability, Quantity, Suitability Assessment
tasks.description: Assess availability, quantity and suitability of data sets needed

tasks.name: Bias Examination, Detection, Prevention and Mitigation
tasks.description: Examine the data sets in view of possible biases. Take appropriate measures to detect, prevent and mitigate them.

tasks.name: Data Gap Analysis
tasks.description: Identify relevant data gaps / shortcomings to compliance and how to address them

tasks.name: Data Relevancy and Representativeness
tasks.description: Assessing Data for Relevance, Representativeness, Correctness and Completeness

tasks.name: Consideration of Specific Settings
tasks.description: Consideration of elements particular to intended setting

tasks.name: Intended Purpose, Provider and Version
tasks.description: Describe the intended purpose, the provider and the verions of the system

tasks.name: System Interaction
tasks.description: Describe how the system interacts or can interact with hardware and software

tasks.name: Software or Firmware Version and Updates
tasks.description: Describe the version of relevant software / firmware and requirements related to version updates

tasks.name: System Development
tasks.description: Describe the methods and steps for the development of the system

tasks.name: System Design and General Logic
tasks.description: Describe the design specifications, design choices and the general logic of the system and algorithms

tasks.name: System Optimization
tasks.description: Describe what the system is designed to optimize for and the relevance of different Parameters.

tasks.name: System Output
tasks.description: Describe the expected output and output quality of the system

tasks.name: Trade-Offs
tasks.description: Describe decisions about trade-offs re: technical solutions for compliance

tasks.name: System Architecture and Resources
tasks.description: Describe the system architecture and he computational resources to develop, train, test and validate the system

tasks.name: Data Requirements
tasks.description: Describe the data requirements re: training methodologies / techniques and training datas sets used

tasks.name: Training Data
tasks.description: Describe how the training data was obtained and selected, labelling and data cleaning methods

tasks.name: Assessment of Human Oversight Measures
tasks.description: Describe the assessment of the human oversight measures

tasks.name: Pre-determined Changes and Continuous Compliance
tasks.description: Describe pre-determined changes to the system and its performance and technical solutions adopted to ensure continuous compliance

tasks.name: Validation, Testing and Compliance Measure
tasks.description: Describe the validation and testing procedures used, the metrics used to measue compliance and test logs and reports

tasks.name: Cybersecurity Measures
tasks.description: Describe the cybersecurity measures put in place

tasks.name: System Monitoring
tasks.description: Provide information about the monitoring of the system

tasks.name: System Functioning
tasks.description: Provide information about the functioning of the system

tasks.name: System Control
tasks.description: Provide information about the control of the system

tasks.name: Performance Capabilities and Limitations
tasks.description: Provide information re: capabilities and limitations in performance

tasks.name: Unintended Outcomes and Risk Sources
tasks.description: Provide information re: foreseeable unintended outcomes and risk sources

tasks.name: Human Oversight Measures
tasks.description: Provide information re: human oversight measures

tasks.name: Input Data Specifications
tasks.description: Provide information re: input data

tasks.name: Appropriateness of Performance Metrics
tasks.description: Describe the appropriateness of the system's performance metrics

tasks.name: Risk Management System
tasks.description: Describe the risk management system

tasks.name: Relevant Changes
tasks.description: Describe relevant changes made by provider through system's lifecycle

tasks.name: Harmonized Standards
tasks.description: Provide a list of harmonized standards applied / solutions adopted for compliance

tasks.name: EU Declaration of Conformity
tasks.description: Provide a copy of the EU declaration of conformity

tasks.name: Post-Market Performance Evaluation
tasks.description: Describe the post-market performance evaluation system

tasks.name: Automatic Event Recording
tasks.description: Ensure the system automatically records events throughout its lifetime.

tasks.name: Recording of Events relevant for Specific Purposes
tasks.description: Enable recording of events to support risk identification, substantial modifications, post-market monitoring, and operational monitoring.

tasks.name: Usage Period Recording
tasks.description: Provide recording of the period of each use of the system

tasks.name: Reference Database
tasks.description: Provide the reference database used

tasks.name: Input Data
tasks.description: Provide input data that resulted in a match during the system's operation.

tasks.name: Natural Persons Involved in Verification
tasks.description: Provide the identification of natural persons involved in the verification of results.

tasks.name: Design for Transparency
tasks.description: Ensure the system's design and development incorporate sufficient transparency measures

tasks.name: Accompanying Instructions
tasks.description: Provide instructions for use in an appropriate digital format. Ensure information is concise, complete, correct, clear, relevant, accessible, and comprehensible

tasks.name: Provider Indentity
tasks.description: Provide the identity and contact details of the provider and information on the authorized representative

tasks.name: Characteristics, Capabilities, and Limitations of Performance
tasks.description: Detail characteristics, capabilities, and limitations of performance, including the intended purpose, expected levels of accuracy, robustness, cybersecurity, and known risks

tasks.name: Pre-determined Changes
tasks.description: Detail the pre-determined changes to the system and its performance over time

tasks.name: Human Oversight Measures
tasks.description: Detail the human oversight measures included in the system

tasks.name: Computational and Hardware Resources
tasks.description: Include details about computational and hardware resources, expected lifetime, and maintenance required for proper functioning

tasks.name: Log Collection
tasks.description: Provide information on the mechanisms for deployers to collect, store, and interpret logs generated by the system

tasks.name: Design for Human Oversight
tasks.description: Development and design of the system to enable effective human oversight

tasks.name: Objectives of Human Oversight
tasks.description: Prevention / minimization of risks to protected assets for usual use or foreseeable misuse.

tasks.name: Measures for Human Oversigth
tasks.description: Commensurateness of measures with risks, level of autonomy and context of use

tasks.name: Verification of Identification - special requirements for certain AI Systems
tasks.description: For Annex III (1)(a) systems, measures shall ensure separate verification by at least two natural persons

tasks.name: Understanding Capacities and Limitations
tasks.description: Enable overseer to understand the capacities and limitations of the system and monitor its operation

tasks.name: Awareness of Automation Bias
tasks.description: Enable overseer to remain aware of the automation bias

tasks.name: Correct Interpretation of Output
tasks.description: Enable overseer to interpret the system's output

tasks.name: Decision to Override or Disregard AI Output
tasks.description: Enable overseer to decide to override or disregard the system's output

tasks.name: Intervention and Stop Mechanism
tasks.description: Enable overseer to intervene in the operation of the system or interrupt it.

tasks.name: Design for Accuracy, Robustness, and Cybersecurity
tasks.description: Ensure AI system maintains accuracy, robustness, and cybersecurity throughout lifecycle

tasks.name: Declaration of Accuracy Metrics
tasks.description: Declare the levels and metric for accuracy in instructions of use

tasks.name: Robustness Measures
tasks.description: Take technical and organisational measures to ensure robustness

tasks.name: Feedback Loop Mitigation
tasks.description: Eliminate or reduce the risk of feedback loops when developing self-learning systems

tasks.name: Cybersecurity Measures
tasks.description: Implement technical solutions to ensure cybersecurity

tasks.name: Measure Appropriateness
tasks.description: Ensure appropriateness of technical solutions to circumstances and risks

tasks.name: Measures for AI-specific Vulnerabilities
tasks.description: Address data and model poisoning, adversarial examples, model evasion, confidentiality attacks, model flaws

assessments.name: ISO/IEC TR 24029-1 - AI Assessment of the Robustness of Neural Networks
assessments.description: Assessment of the robustness of neural networks

tasks.name: Robustness
tasks.description: Assess the robustness of the neural network

tasks.name: Adversarial Attacks
tasks.description: Assess the neural network's vulnerability to adversarial attacks

tasks.name: Data Augmentation
tasks.description: Assess the neural network's performance with data augmentation

tasks.name: Noise Robustness
tasks.description: Assess the neural network's performance with noise robustness

tasks.name: Model Robustness
tasks.description: Assess the neural network's model robustness

tasks.name: Adversarial Training
tasks.description: Assess the neural network's performance with adversarial training

assessments.name: ISO/IEC TR 24027 - Bias in AI systems and AI aided decision making
assessments.description: Assess the Seven Dimensions of Trustworthiness of your AI System

tasks.name: Bias
tasks.description: Assess the bias in the AI system

tasks.name: Data Bias
tasks.description: Assess the data bias in the AI system

tasks.name: Algorithmic Bias
tasks.description: Assess the algorithmic bias in the AI system

tasks.name: Model Bias
tasks.description: Assess the model bias in the AI system

tasks.name: Output Bias
tasks.description: Assess the output bias in the AI system

tasks.name: Bias Mitigation
tasks.description: Assess the bias mitigation in the AI system

tasks.name: Data Bias
tasks.description: Assess the data bias in the AI system

assessments.description: Risk assessment framework for AI systems
